page.title: 12GILMORTON CRICKET CLUB
page.content: This was formed in 1971 by local residents to play social matches against nearby village teams.After 3 separate grounds were used in the first 4 years,a lease was obtained on the present ground at Lutterworth Road,Gilmorton.1979 saw the entry into Division Six of the Rugby Advertiser League played on Wednesday evenings. Today the club has over 40 members and a thriving junior section for children over 5 years old. Friendly matches are played each Sunday throughout the cricket season and continued success in the Evening League has advanced Gilmorton to Division Three. The local village identity is still retained as all members are either local residents or have strong connections with Gilmorton,thus preserving the original concept of the founders.
